title: Why the CIA is a Mess.
keywords: Creators Syndicate Cartoonist Group Niger Yellow Cake Iraq war Iraq WMD C.I.A. Central Intelligence Agency President George W. Bush President George Bush President Bush presidents politician politicians Joe Wilson Joseph Wilson Valerie Wilson Valerie Plame
caption: Why don't you send me to Niger, Valerie, so I can write a big column in the N.Y. Times about what a stupid liar Bush is?  CIA Top Secret.  Good idea.
